## IIframeInitializerOptions.origin property

target host for iframe, can be used to isolate environment on cross origin

[src](./engine-core.iiframeinitializeroptions.src.md) will overrule this

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
origin?: string;
```

## Example

`http://127.0.0.1`
